content.text: This version of my personal website is exclusive to the Constellation Browser. Use the buttons below to move around, or scroll down for the 'about me' section.

items: My name is Lillie. I also go by Pup. Call me either, or both!
Here's my list of labels... I am: Transgender, lesbian, polyamorous, neurodivergent, autistic, ADHD, OCD, furry, pegasister, age regressor, and therian.
I'm most-usually an optimist. I like to see things from a positive, hopeful point of view.
I would like to be a VTuber one day.
I am a therian. I'm a nine-tailed kitsune.
I'm a Discord moderator for VShojo's Hime Hajime. I was also formerly a Discord administrator for RiiConnect24, a Discord moderator for WiiLink24, and a Discord & Twitch moderator for VTuber Marina.
My favorite video games are Pokemon XD: Gale of Darkness, A Hat in Time, and Inscryption.

content.text: More info about me is available on my main website at lillie2523.carrd.co
